overview:
Jonathan is the founder of Vastrm (vas’ trum), an apparel company that is setting out to solve the problem of fit.

Tang’s roots in China extend for generations where his family has been prominent in textiles, apparel, education and government. Tang helped grow his family’s apparel and textile factories before entering the world of technology, where he founded one of the first on-demand CRM companies in 1999. Tang has since combined his passion for apparel, fashion, technology and entrepreneurship to launch Vastrm Fashion.

As Founder of Salesnet, Tang was responsible for helping to shape web CRM strategies for clients such as MSFT, Staples, AMEX, FDMS, Sovereign Bank, Tellabs and others. Salesnet was acquired by RightNow Technologies in 2006 (NASDAQ: RNOW)(now ORCL).

Tang’s was recognized by the Boston Business Journal (BBJ) naming him a 40 under 40 honoree.
